review.reviewText: I spent only one night there so location wasn't important for me. It is an advantage that there is parking opportunity and laundry service. My stay was comfortable. I would stay there again.

review.title: dont like
review.reviewText: i didn't like the service, i didn't like the option that they let me pay by expidia. ..........

review.title: OK for the money
review.reviewText: The hotel room was very small, the bathroom super small and door don't open all the way. The bed sheet was stained and smell muskie.  The front staff was friendly but the housekeeping staff not friendly at all. Great location but parking is limited for four cars.

review.title: Clean and up-to-date. Great value.
review.reviewText: This is a nice hotel. Room is large enough, has a frig., reasonably priced mini bar and is remarkably clean. I had a delux single - one queen (the least expensive) room. I have only two issues - the room they gave me - interior first floor had no window. So...no morning light, no idea what the weather was. The receptionist (very nice woman) advised that next time, I specify that I want a window. My other issue can be fixed at no expense. Although the room was clean, the bed was VERY poorly made - bedspread pulled up over sheets that have just been thrown on the bed and not tucked - top or bottom sheet. The top sheet was on sideways and barely came to my shoulder, so before I could sleep, I had to remake the whole bed. Costs nothing to do a good job of preparing the bed so I hope they take care of that before I return. Having said that, everything else was great - wifi worked, complimentary toiletries in the bath, hot water if you wait for it, new mattress and good central location. I will choose San Francisco de Asis again. If the bed issue has been addressed, I'll let you know.
